## MoneypStoreListenerParams interface

Parameters passed to [MoneypStore](./lib-base.moneypstore.md) listeners.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface MoneypStoreListenerParams<T = unknown> 
```

## Remarks

Use the [subscribe()](./lib-base.moneypstore.subscribe.md) function to register a listener.

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [newState](./lib-base.moneypstorelistenerparams.newstate.md) | [MoneypStoreState](./lib-base.moneypstorestate.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt; | The entire previous state. |
